Name: Code/The Werewolf Party
About the game: Inspired by the party games Werewolf and Mafia. This is a group role-playing game of analyzing and being analyzed, deceiving and being deceived, controlling and being controlled, and thinking creatively. In this game you can change costume anime style. You can make a cool character or make a comedic character if you like. You can chat with your friend in visual novel game style. You can even use this game as a tool to make some story script for your visual novel. The main game is werewolf. Just like main stream werewolf game in real life when you play in the game you can vote for who you deem as evil. If you are werewolf chose some one you think is the villager and attack them that night. Play cool stay calm as just trolling the game by telling them you are werewolf but the trust you are the troll. And many more mini game you can play with your friend will implement later.
